biotools.summary: BANΔIT (B’‐factor analysis and ΔB’ interpretation toolkit) is web application that provides a graphical user interface for the normalization and analysis of B’‐factor profiles. The analysis of B‐factor profiles from X‐ray protein structures can be utilized for structure‐based drug design since protein mobility changes have been associated with the quality of protein‐ligand interactions.

bioschemas.name: BANDIT
